title: Better Tea Club
transcripts:
We hope you're sitting, for we have bad news. The teas in your supermarket are really, really old. They've traveled from a farm to a factory, then a broker who sold them to a blender, who shipped them to a packer, who transported them to a distributor, who placed them in a warehouse before finally shipping them to a store. The young leaves at the start of this journey have grown old and tired by the time you take them home. 

Our better tea club is-- well, better. Enjoy fresh teas brimming with flavor delivered to your door each month. Never run out of tea or suffer another sip of what passes for tea in aisle 6. Your first shipment is just $0.99. 

Choose to receive loose, bagged, or cold brew iced teas. Future shipments are just $6.99 each. Change or cancel anytime. Better tea awaits. Join the club today.
